means: 对（某人或某事物）评价过低

sentence.Network_en: We women have a lot of good business skills, although we tend to underrate ourselves.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们女性拥有很多出色的商业技巧，只是我们往往会看轻自己。

sentence.Network_en: I fear that I underrate the difficulty of the task.
sentence.Network_cn: 我担心我低估了这项任务的困难。

sentence.Network_en: I don't underrate the decorative side of life.
sentence.Network_cn: 我并不低估生活中起装饰作用的东西的价值.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE 同义词总结大全 ... pejorative adj． 带有轻蔑意义的，贬低的 underrate v 低估,估计过低,看轻 | contempt n． 轻视，鄙视.
GRE 同义词总结大全 ... pejorative adj． 带有轻蔑意义的，贬低的 underrate v 低估,估计过低,看轻 | contempt n． 轻视，鄙视.
GRE 同义词总结大全 ... pejorative adj． 带有轻蔑意义的，贬低的 underrate v 低估,估计过低,看轻 | contempt n． 轻视，鄙视.

list.abs: We underrated his powers as a speaker ., 我们低估了他的演说才能.
I underrated you !, 我低估了你!
Let your friends underrate your advantage , while let your enemies overrate your disadvantage ., 让朋友低估你的优点 , 让敌人高估你的缺点.
What is the most underrated item in menswear and women swear ?, 什么是男装及女装最被低估的项目?

entry.def: If you underrate someone or something, you do not recognize how clever, important, or significant they are.

example.ex: We women have a lot of good business skills, although we tend to underrate ourselves...
example.tran: 我们女性拥有很多出色的商业技巧，只是我们往往会看轻自己。

example.ex: He underrated the seriousness of William's head injury.
example.tran: 他低估了威廉头部伤势的严重性。

means.word_mean: 1. make too low an estimate of;

sentences.sentence: "he underestimated the work that went into the renovation"
"Don't underestimate the danger of such a raft trip on this river"

auth_sentence.content: No historian of art will be inclined to underrate the sway of style.
auth_sentence.res_content: No historian of art will be inclined to underrate the sway of style.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No historian of art will be inclined to underrate the sway of style.

auth_sentence.content: So seen their standing, one can't underrate both researchers' contribution to the present discussion.
auth_sentence.res_content: So seen their standing, one can't underrate both researchers' contribution to the present discussion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So seen their standing, one can't underrate both researchers' contribution to the present discussion.

auth_sentence.content: He added, I think one thing you must not underrate is the power of radio.
auth_sentence.res_content: He added, I think one thing you must not underrate is the power of radio.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He added, I think one thing you must not underrate is the power of radio.
